Package org.flowable.dmn.api

Interface DmnDeploymentBuilder

  • public interface DmnDeploymentBuilder
    Builder for creating new deployments. A builder instance can be obtained through DmnRepositoryService.createDeployment(). Multiple resources can be added to one deployment before calling the deploy() operation. After deploying, no more changes can be made to the returned deployment and the builder instance can be disposed.
    Author:
    Tijs Rademakers, Joram Barrez
